mapper.select: SELECT transport.number, drivers.first_name, drivers.last_name, a.id as driverAddrId, a.street as driverStreet, a.house_number as driverHouseNumber, route.id as routeId, a1.id as stopFromId, a1.street as streetFrom, a1.house_number as houseNumberFrom, a2.id as stopToId, a2.street as streetTo, a2.house_number as houseNumberTo FROM schema.depos Inner join transport_type on depos.transport_type_id=transport_type.id Inner join transport on transport_type.id=transport.transport_type_id Inner join route on transport.route_id=route.id Inner join address a1 on a1.id = route.station_from Inner join address a2 on a2.id = route.station_to Inner join drivers on transport.drivers_id = drivers.id Inner join address a on a.id = drivers.address_id where transport_type.id = 1
